docs.snippet: THE demand for steamship travel in Caribbean, South American and other southern services is leveling off and losing its abnormal post-war character, shipping and travel men report.
docs.lead_paragraph: THE demand for steamship travel in Caribbean, South American and other southern services is leveling off and losing its abnormal post-war character, shipping and travel men report.

headline.main: CARIBBEAN CRUISES; More Space Is Available For Trips in Fall

docs.snippet: LONDON, Aug. 21 (Reuters) -- After four post-war boom years, British shipyards fear that they may soon be driven to serious retrenchment.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, Aug. 21 (Reuters) -- After four post-war boom years, British shipyards fear that they may soon be driven to serious retrenchment.
docs.abstract: Retrenchment feared as war and postwar boom ends

docs.snippet: Four countries -- Cuba, the Dominican Republic, Haiti and Panama -- with identical ratings, ranked highest in both credits and collections in the forty-second semi-annual survey of commercial credit and collection conditions in Latin-American markets...
docs.lead_paragraph: Four countries -- Cuba, the Dominican Republic, Haiti and Panama -- with identical ratings, ranked highest in both credits and collections in the forty-second semi-annual survey of commercial credit and collection conditions in Latin-American markets during the first half of 1949, made by the Foreign Credit Interchange Bureau of the National Association of Credit Men.

docs.snippet: The Long Island Rail Road should be the finest commuting railroad in the world, Martin W. Clement, president of the Pennsylvania Railroad, asserted on his arrival here yesterday. But no commuting railroad can operate under present Government...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Long Island Rail Road should be the finest commuting railroad in the world, Martin W. Clement, president of the Pennsylvania Railroad, asserted on his arrival here yesterday. But no commuting railroad can operate under present Government regulations, he added.

headline.main: Long Island Could Be Best Commuter Line But for U. S. Rules, Head of P. R. R. Asserts

docs.snippet: New interest in investments in Latin America became apparent here last week with word that that troubled area's dollar problems would soon be solved.
docs.lead_paragraph: New interest in investments in Latin America became apparent here last week with word that that troubled area's dollar problems would soon be solved.

headline.main: INVESTORS' DOLLAR LOOKS SOUTH AGAIN; Interest in Latin America Rises With Reports That U.S. Will Give Financial Help INVESTORS' DOLLAR LOOKS SOUTH AGAIN
